com.company

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.Settings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is for saving the settings in the program which needs to be serialized an implements the java.io.Serializable interface .
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Settings()
      Makes a new settings class based on the default settings which are : light theme , null exit operation and false follow redirect ( unchecked ) .
